name: ssbri
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c3, c2))

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c3, c2)), wss(c1, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c3, c2))
-| wss(c1, c3)
-| wi(wss(c1, c3), wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c3, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c3, c2))
-| wss(c1, c3)
-| wi(wss(c1, c3), wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c3, c2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wss(c1, c3), wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c3, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c3, c2))
-| wss(c1, c3)

comment: Inference from a subclass relationship of binary relations. (Contributed by NM, 28-Mar-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)
